For the quantification of free amino acids, the leaf sample (each 0.5 g) was ground in 10 mL of potassium phosphate buffer. The mixture was centrifuged at 12,000× g at 4 °C. To 1 mL of the supernatant, 1 mL of ninhydrin (2%) and 1 mL of pyridine (10%) were added, and the mixture was placed in a water bath for 30 min. After cooling all samples, absorbance was read at 750 nm using a spectrophotometer
54 .
